verbs.description: [V: halloween] [ARG1: blizzard] of 91 by the numbers watching the cubs come back to stay alive in the 2016 world series sunday night took me back to october 30 1991 when minnesotans were celebrating the twins second world series win in four years time folks had no idea what was going to unfold over the next few days nws tv station golden valley blizzard national weather service lake superior halloween duluth minnesota chicago cubs world series
